segment.source: Key features in MDT 2013 Update 2 (Windows 10)
segment.target: Key features in MDT 2013 Update 2 (Windows 10)

segment.source: The Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) has been in existence since 2003, when it was first introduced as Business Desktop Deployment (BDD) 1.0.
segment.target: The Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) has been in existence since 2003, when it was first introduced as Business Desktop Deployment (BDD) 1.0.

segment.source: Key features in MDT 2013 Update 2
segment.target: Key features in MDT 2013 Update 2

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: The Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) has been in existence since 2003, when it was first introduced as Business Desktop Deployment (BDD) 1.0.
segment.target: The Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) has been in existence since 2003, when it was first introduced as Business Desktop Deployment (BDD) 1.0.

segment.source: The toolkit has evolved, both in functionality and popularity, and today it is considered fundamental to Windows operating system and enterprise application deployment.
segment.target: The toolkit has evolved, both in functionality and popularity, and today it is considered fundamental to Windows operating system and enterprise application deployment.

segment.source: MDT 2013 has many useful features, the most important of which are:
segment.target: MDT 2013 has many useful features, the most important of which are:

segment.source: Windows Client support.
segment.target: Windows Client support.

segment.source: Supports Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10.
segment.target: Supports Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10.

segment.source: Windows Server support.
segment.target: Windows Server support.

segment.source: Supports Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012, and Windows Server 2012 R2.
segment.target: Supports Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012, and Windows Server 2012 R2.

segment.source: Additional operating systems support.
segment.target: Additional operating systems support.

segment.source: Supports Windows Thin PC and Windows Embedded POSReady 7, as well as Windows 8.1 Embedded Industry.
segment.target: Supports Windows Thin PC and Windows Embedded POSReady 7, as well as Windows 8.1 Embedded Industry.

segment.source: UEFI support.
segment.target: UEFI support.

segment.source: Supports deployment to machines using Unified Extensible Firmware Interface (UEFI) version 2.3.1.
segment.target: Supports deployment to machines using Unified Extensible Firmware Interface (UEFI) version 2.3.1.

segment.source: GPT support.
segment.target: GPT support.

segment.source: Supports deployment to machines that require the new GUID (globally unique identifier) partition table (GPT) format.
segment.target: Supports deployment to machines that require the new GUID (globally unique identifier) partition table (GPT) format.

segment.source: This is related to UEFI.
segment.target: This is related to UEFI.

segment.source: Enhanced Windows PowerShell support.
segment.target: Enhanced Windows PowerShell support.

segment.source: Provides support for running PowerShell scripts.
segment.target: Provides support for running PowerShell scripts.

segment.source: figure 2
segment.target: figure 2

segment.source: Figure 2.
segment.target: Figure 2.

segment.source: The deployment share mounted as a standard PSDrive allows for administration using PowerShell.
segment.target: The deployment share mounted as a standard PSDrive allows for administration using PowerShell.

segment.source: Add local administrator accounts.
segment.target: Add local administrator accounts.

segment.source: Allows you to add multiple user accounts to the local Administrators group on the target computers, either via settings or the deployment wizard.
segment.target: Allows you to add multiple user accounts to the local Administrators group on the target computers, either via settings or the deployment wizard.

segment.source: Automated participation in CEIP and WER.
segment.target: Automated participation in CEIP and WER.

segment.source: Provides configuration for participation in Windows Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP) and Windows Error Reporting (WER).
segment.target: Provides configuration for participation in Windows Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP) and Windows Error Reporting (WER).

segment.source: Deploy Windows RE.
segment.target: Deploy Windows RE.

segment.source: Enables deployment of a customized Windows Recovery Environment (Windows RE) as part of the task sequence.
segment.target: Enables deployment of a customized Windows Recovery Environment (Windows RE) as part of the task sequence.

segment.source: Deploy to VHD.
segment.target: Deploy to VHD.

segment.source: Provides ready-made task sequence templates for deploying Windows into a virtual hard disk (VHD) file.
segment.target: Provides ready-made task sequence templates for deploying Windows into a virtual hard disk (VHD) file.

segment.source: Improved deployment wizard.
segment.target: Improved deployment wizard.

segment.source: Provides additional progress information and a cleaner UI for the Lite Touch Deployment Wizard.
segment.target: Provides additional progress information and a cleaner UI for the Lite Touch Deployment Wizard.

segment.source: Monitoring.
segment.target: Monitoring.

segment.source: Allows you to see the status of currently running deployments.
segment.target: Allows you to see the status of currently running deployments.

segment.source: Apply GPO Pack.
segment.target: Apply GPO Pack.

segment.source: Allows you to deploy local group policy objects created by Microsoft Security Compliance Manager (SCM).
segment.target: Allows you to deploy local group policy objects created by Microsoft Security Compliance Manager (SCM).

segment.source: Partitioning routines.
segment.target: Partitioning routines.

segment.source: Provides improved partitioning routines to ensure that deployments work regardless of the current hard drive structure.
segment.target: Provides improved partitioning routines to ensure that deployments work regardless of the current hard drive structure.

segment.source: Offline BitLocker.
segment.target: Offline BitLocker.

segment.source: Provides the capability to have BitLocker enabled during the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE) phase, thus saving hours of encryption time.
segment.target: Provides the capability to have BitLocker enabled during the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE) phase, thus saving hours of encryption time.

segment.source: USMT offline user-state migration.
segment.target: USMT offline user-state migration.

segment.source: Provides support for running the User State Migration Tool (USMT) capture offline, during the Windows PE phase of the deployment.
segment.target: Provides support for running the User State Migration Tool (USMT) capture offline, during the Windows PE phase of the deployment.

segment.source: figure 3
segment.target: figure 3

segment.source: Figure 3.
segment.target: Figure 3.

segment.source: The offline USMT backup in action.
segment.target: The offline USMT backup in action.

segment.source: Install or uninstall Windows roles or features.
segment.target: Install or uninstall Windows roles or features.

segment.source: Enables you to select roles and features as part of the deployment wizard.
segment.target: Enables you to select roles and features as part of the deployment wizard.

segment.source: MDT also supports uninstall of roles and features.
segment.target: MDT also supports uninstall of roles and features.

segment.source: Microsoft System Center 2012 Orchestrator integration.
segment.target: Microsoft System Center 2012 Orchestrator integration.

segment.source: Provides the capability to use Orchestrator runbooks as part of the task sequence.
segment.target: Provides the capability to use Orchestrator runbooks as part of the task sequence.

segment.source: Support for DaRT.
segment.target: Support for DaRT.

segment.source: Supports optional integration of the DaRT components into the boot image.
segment.target: Supports optional integration of the DaRT components into the boot image.

segment.source: Support for Office 2013.
segment.target: Support for Office 2013.

segment.source: Provides added support for deploying Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2013.
segment.target: Provides added support for deploying Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2013.

segment.source: Support for Modern UI app package provisioning.
segment.target: Support for Modern UI app package provisioning.

segment.source: Provisions applications based on the new Windows app package standard, which is used in Windows 8 and later.
segment.target: Provisions applications based on the new Windows app package standard, which is used in Windows 8 and later.

segment.source: Extensibility.
segment.target: Extensibility.

segment.source: Provides the capability to extend MDT far beyond the built-in features by adding custom scripts, web services, System Center Orchestrator runbooks, PowerShell scripts, and VBScripts.
segment.target: Provides the capability to extend MDT far beyond the built-in features by adding custom scripts, web services, System Center Orchestrator runbooks, PowerShell scripts, and VBScripts.

segment.source: Upgrade task sequence.
segment.target: Upgrade task sequence.

segment.source: Provides a new upgrade task sequence template that you can use to upgrade existing Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows 8.1 systems directly to Windows 10, automatically preserving all data, settings, applications, and drivers.
segment.target: Provides a new upgrade task sequence template that you can use to upgrade existing Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows 8.1 systems directly to Windows 10, automatically preserving all data, settings, applications, and drivers.

segment.source: For more information about using this new upgrade task sequence, refer to the Microsoft Deployment Toolkit resource page.
segment.target: For more information about using this new upgrade task sequence, refer to the Microsoft Deployment Toolkit resource page.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Prepare for deployment with MDT 2013 Update 2
segment.target: Prepare for deployment with MDT 2013 Update 2

segment.target: MDT 2013 Update 2 Lite Touch components
